contact.body: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact the webmaster. (English is fine)

contribute.caption: Penguin Statistics is a non-profit community project that relies on the joint maintenance and support of everyone. We welcome you to go to our GitHub and give us a star, as well as provide feedback and suggestions through Issues. Of course, issues and PRs are always welcomed!
contribute.contribute_0: If you have experience with any of the following skills and want to contribute to Penguin Statistics, join our Discord below or alternatively our QQ group: 257673827.
contribute.contribute_1: This is a nonprofit and open source project
contribute.newFolder: Currently working hard creating the project repo...

material.content:
Penguin Statistics uses various game resources (such as pictures, animations, audio, original text, and translations) to reflect game elements and enhance user experience. Copyright for these resources belongs to Shanghai Hypergryph Network Technology Co., Ltd. and/or its affiliates, including YOSTAR (HONG KONG) LIMITED, 株式会社Yostar, YOSTAR LIMITED, 龍成網路, and others.
Penguin Statistics utilizes some assets from PRTS Wiki [http://prts.wiki](http://prts.wiki) and has modified some of the assets without modifying their original meaning.
Penguin Statistics used the slightly self-modified version of the Bender font, provided by the Free Fonts Project ([http://jovanny.ru](http://jovanny.ru)) under a usage basis claimed on the official website of the Project. Penguin Statistics expresses gratitude for the openness of the Free Fonts Project and the licenses it uses.
material.title: Content Credits

donate.donate_3: pocky or apple pie are also accepted

intro.intro_1: Penguin Statistics is the Department of Data Analysis of Penguin Logistics (not really). We devote ourselves to item drop analysis.
intro.intro_2: Penguin Statistics' current dataset is maintained through a combination of player manual reports, screenshot recognitions, and other uploads via public APIs. The Penguin Statistics team performs various types of automatic, scheduled, and manual maintenance to ensure the dataset's accuracy.
intro.intro_3: To ensure dataset transparency and list out dataset changes, Dataset Invalidation Transparency Report is now planned to be implemented.

causes.limitation: This report has a significant discrepancy with our current data. Continuing with the submission may result in it being flagged as an outlier and not included in the overall statistical data.

contact.after: Please indicate the stage name and drops. A screenshot is also preferred for verification purposes. Our team will mark your report appropriately after verifying it.
contact.before: If you are sure you got this drop in-game, submit this report and

continue.first: Are you sure you want to submit this report?

closedReason.EXPIRED: Not within Reportable Time Range: Either has the stage already closed or has not yet opened.
closedReason.INVALID: Unable to Report: This stage does not contain drop reporting metadata.
closedReason.NOT_FOUND: Stage Not Found: The stage does not exist in the server you have selected.

report.gacha: Multiple results are allowed in a singular report for this stage.
report.name: Report

notices.rule_1: Report one clear at a time. Please double-check your drop selection.
notices.rule_2: If there are no drops, click submit directly without selecting any drops.
notices.rule_3: Please do not report the first-clear of a stage, and do not only report the clears where you were lucky - report all clears.
notices.rule_4: Please make sure that you refresh a 3-stars clear.
notices.rule_5: Please only submit drop data from the CN server.

dialog.subtitle: Sending recognition defect feedback will upload such screenshot image, recognition result and environment info (including current UI version, recognition core version and recognition resource version) to us. After receiving your feedback, we will use the submitted feedback to optimize algorithm used in screenshot recognition. Thank you for helping us improving the recognition feature!
dialog.title: Send Recognition Defect Feedback

recognition.description: Simply select a screenshot of the settlement page to automatically identify and upload all drop results.

exceptions.3stars::False: Suspected to be a non-3-stars clear

DropAreaDrops::Illegal.subtitle: There should be no drop in this stage, but there are some in the screenshot. This is usually caused by event drop during non-event period
DropAreaDrops::Illegal.title: Illegal drops found

DropAreaDropsQuantity::NotFound.title: Failed to recognize the drop quantity

DropQuantityChar::LowConfidence.subtitle: Low confidence in the recognition result. Please check if the result is consistent with the screenshot.
DropQuantityChar::LowConfidence.title: Error in item quantity recognition

Droptypes::Illegal.subtitle: There are illegal drop types in the screenshot, like first-clear or return AP
Droptypes::Illegal.title: Illegal drop type

StageChar::LowConfidence.subtitle: Low confidence in the recognition result. Please check if the result is consistent with the screenshot.
StageChar::LowConfidence.title: Error in stage recognition

notices.confirm:
Click the image to enlarge it for double-checking.
Screenshots that passed the legibility test have already been selected for upload.
For dataset accuracy considerations, screenshots that failed the legibility tests are **not allowed** from upload.
notices.welcome:
Image files will be recognized **locally** using **WebAssembly** technology. We will not upload images to our server.
Please use screenshots taken within 36 hours that contain only 3-stars clear. Duplications will be detected and marked as *excluded*.
Please do not report the first-clear of a stage, and do not only report the clears where you were lucky - report all clears.

report.caption: Thanks for reporting. Your data will be revealed in the global dataset of website in 20 minutes at most because of cache.
report.partialFailed: {count} failed battle result reports. Please follow the troubleshooting steps below
report.partialFailedDesc:
Check your network connection: The upload may be failed if the network connection is poor.
In order to ensure that the entire site data set is not affected by external attacks, if you still cannot upload after multiple retries, your submission volume may have triggered the reporting limit. Please try again after 24 hours to upload the remaining drop reports.
Your IP may be shared with others, because individuals cannot be located due to the nature of IP. In this case, please try to switch your mobile network or WiFi to retry recognition, or you can retry uploading after 24 hours.
To prevent retransmission attacks, we will attach a timestamp to your request; if the time of your device is too far from the standard time, the upload may fail. Please try to calibrate the device time and try again.
report.title: Report Details

tips.abnormal: {count} image(s) have been "excluded" because they either failed to pass legibility test, or failed to be recognized

filter.title: Filter

headerDesc.apCost: The Sanity required for the stage
headerDesc.apPPR: Expected Sanity required for getting 1x of this item
headerDesc.clearTime: The shortest possible time required to clear this stage, a.k.a. the time duration starting from the beginning of the combat to the appearance of the last enemy. Data source: [PRTS Wiki]({prtsLink}).
headerDesc.itemPerTime: With the "Percentage" calculated, the expected amount of time required to acquire 1 item is calculated as (ClearTime / (Loots / Samples))
headerDesc.patternPercentage: Possibility to get this drop pattern. Calculated as (Loots / Samples)
headerDesc.percentage: Expected drop rate. Calculated as (Loots / Samples)
headerDesc.quantity: The sum of all drops in this stage
headerDesc.timeRange: Due to the change of the drop table of this stage, the data in this row will only contain the data from the last change of the drop table, indicated as "Time Range"
headerDesc.times: The sum of the samples in this stage
